review.title: “This Place is a Black Hole of Death that Will Suck the Happiness from Your Daily Life.”
review.pros: Pros – Worked with me on a work permit.
review.cons: Cons – 1. Passive-Aggressive management style. If they have a problem, they will call a meeting and address the problem to the entire staff, never directly coming to you one-on-one to address the issue.2. Support staff is unionized, which creates a "them vs. us" attitude.3. Cultivates, encourages and emphasizes insecurity and jealousy among staff and workers - people are constantly fearing for their jobs.4. The Partners have no idea what's going on - and if they do, they choose to ignore it or have the office manager address it in a passive-aggressive forum.5. Lack of communication from Lawyers to Support Staff.6. Lack of any sort of training with regards to anything.7. Lack of any assignment of a Mentor of any kind.8. Hire young workers to manipulate the situation - young workers = lower wage = more profits for the company.9. Lack of action to correct gossip or "office poison."10. Lack of recognition for how hard their support staff works.11. Lack of recognition for the time given up with family in order to work over-time.12. You will never hear a compliment, only a criticism.13. Serious lack of direction and advancement ability.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Stop creating a hostile work environment.Stop being passive-aggressive.Read the book "How to Win Friends & Influence People"Get at *least* one of your lawyers appointed as QC.
